SELECT * FROM ( SELECT a.*, rowNum AS rnum from( SELECT RE_BO_NO, RE_BO_TITLE, RE_BO_CATEGORY, RE_BO_WRITER, RE_BO_PASS, RE_BO_CONTENT, RE_BO_RECOMMEND, RE_BO_HIT, to_char(re_bo_reg_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS re_BO_REG_DATE , to_char(re_BO_MOD_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS re_BO_MOD_DATE , RE_BO_DEL_YN FROM review_Board WHERE 1=1 AND re_bo_del_yn = 'N' ORDER BY re_bo_no DESC) a ) b WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{paging.firstRow} AND #{paging.lastRow}

SELECT RE_BO_NO, RE_BO_TITLE, RE_BO_CATEGORY, RE_BO_WRITER, RE_BO_PASS, RE_BO_CONTENT, RE_BO_RECOMMEND, RE_BO_HIT, to_char(re_bo_reg_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS re_BO_REG_DATE , to_char(re_BO_MOD_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS re_BO_MOD_DATE , RE_BO_DEL_YN FROM review_Board WHERE 1=1 AND re_bo_no = #{reBoNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE review_board SET re_bo_title = #{reBoTitle} , re_bo_category = #{reBoCategory} , re_bo_content = #{reBoContent} , re_bo_mod_date = sysdate WHERE re_bo_no = #{reBoNo}
